name: Rudra
description:
A lightning-fast, keyboard-centric launcher for GNOME Shell designed for power users.

Key Features:
• Instant App Search: Launch applications with a few keystrokes.
• File Hunt: Quickly find files in your home directory using the '.' prefix.
• Web Search: Search Google ('g ') or YouTube ('yt ') directly from the launcher.
• Command Runner: Execute shell commands using the '>' prefix.
• Deep Customization: Adjust fonts, colors, opacity, corner radius, and screen positioning to match your setup.

Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by Google or YouTube.
